content:
# I have successfully crafted one Stone Furnace, and my inventory now reflects that.
# I have 5 Stone remaining and still 10 Iron Ore. 

# Next, I need to place the Stone Furnace in a suitable location and smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates.
# First, I will move to a position where I can place the Stone Furnace.

# I will find a valid buildable position nearby.
furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)
move_to(furnace_position)  # Move to the nearest valid position to place the Stone Furnace.
